description: Advisory Services to Saudi Communications Commission (SCC)

subproject.corporate outcome: National, regional and local levels of governance expand their capacities to manage the equitable delivery of public services
subproject.description:
1- Revisit and update the  National Frequency Strategy.
2- Development of more efficient and appropriate software for maintenance of National Frequency Register.
3- Development of urgent interim solutions for radio based public telecommunication services to be introduced immediately
4- Capacity Building of national staff
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
